name: Tankero (Finboror)
description:
Tankero is an arcade tank shooter about shooting tanks in a tank.

Features:

  • Destructible environment: Shoot walls down and run over boxes!
  • Polished experience: Definitely 100% bug-free!
  • Online leaderboard: Become the world's best at Tankero!
  • Landmines: Blow your enemies up!
  • ...And really nothing more!

Controls:

  • Move: WASD
  • Shoot: MOUSE1
  • Lay a mine: SPACE
